about_the_game:
‘Mouse Practice For Kids’ helps young children learn how to use a PC mouse by clicking on colorful fruits that appear on the screen.

With cheerful music and rewarding sound effects, ‘Mouse Practice for Kids’ provides a joyful experience while improving fine motor skills. Perfect for parents looking for an engaging and educational activity for their little ones.

The Game Features:

  • Educational Focus: Helps kids develop mouse control skills.

  • Simple Gameplay: Click on colorful fruits and vegetables as they appear.

  • Parental Control Timer: Set a time limit for gameplay; the game automatically shuts down when time is up.

  • Progressive Difficulty: Mouse cursor shrinks as levels advance, while fruits move and become smaller, adding more challenge.

  • Cheerful Feedback: Fun music and sound effects reward progress.

The main feature of the game is a psychological trick, where the mouse cursor and fruits are initially large, encouraging kids to focus on moving the mouse and clicking on the fruit. As they progress through the levels, both the cursor and the fruits gradually decrease in size until the cursor reaches its normal PC size.
